SEARCH
Package utility

Class FileUtils

java.lang.Object
utility.FileUtils
public class FileUtils extends Object
Utility class for file operations, including reading, writing, updating, and deleting entries in a text file. Each entry is assumed to be a line in the file, with fields separated by a delimiter (e.g., "|").

  • Method Details

    • writeToFile

      public static void writeToFile(String filePath, String data)
      Appends data to the specified file.
      Parameters:
      filePath - the path to the file where data will be appended
      data - the data to append to the file

    • readAllLines

      public static List<String> readAllLines(String filePath)
      Reads all lines from the specified file and returns them as a list.
      Parameters:
      filePath - the path to the file to read
      Returns:
      a list of lines from the file, or an empty list if an error occurs

    • updateToFile

      public static void updateToFile(String filePath, String data, String id)
      Updates an entry in the file by replacing the line matching the specified ID.
      Parameters:
      filePath - the path to the file to update
      data - the new data to replace the existing entry
      id - the ID of the entry to update (assumed to be at the start of the line)

    • deleteFromFile

      public static void deleteFromFile(String filePath, String id)
      Deletes an entry in the file with the specified ID.
      Parameters:
      filePath - the path to the file to update
      id - the ID of the entry to delete (assumed to be at the start of the line)

    • findEntryReturnString

      public static String findEntryReturnString(String filePath, String id)
      Finds and returns an entry in the file with the specified ID.
      Parameters:
      filePath - the path to the file to search
      id - the ID of the entry to find (assumed to be at the start of the line)
      Returns:
      the matching entry as a string, or null if no entry is found

    • updateEntry

      public static void updateEntry(String filePath, String id, String updatedText, int index)
      Updates a specific field in an entry in the file by ID and index.
      Parameters:
      filePath - the path to the file to update
      id - the ID of the entry to update (assumed to be at the start of the line)
      updatedText - the new text to replace the field
      index - the index of the field to update (0-based)
